extendedInfo.description: Have you ever been trying to meet friends in a large public space, but been unable to find each other? I created GPS Share for just such a scenario.GPS Share lets you privately send a Google Maps link of your location to whomever you want, whenever you want, however you want. Send an SMS message to rendezvous with friends at a stadium or email yourself a reminder of where you parked at the airport. Post road trip updates to Twitter.Unlike Latitude and many other services, GPS Share does not run in the background and does not share your location with a third party. You use it when you want it.GPS Share is free and Open Source software and has no advertising. Internet access is used only to download Google Maps tiles.

reviews.title: sweet little apps
reviews.comment: would like to see a real time app like this with the same permissions the others want access to everything, great part about this is the other person doesnt need it isntalled.  I drive a truck and sometime I need an additional truck on some back woods road and this just WORKS.  My thanks Ken.
reviews.author: Erin Murphy

reviews.comment: No reviews given!

reviews.title: Wonderful, simple but very useful
reviews.comment: Clean, no ads and open source.  Was thinking of doing something similar myself but this is excellent.
reviews.author: Richy Delaney

reviews.title: Very nice!
reviews.comment: What a simple and brilliant little app! I can think of many different potential uses including at work I travel to many locations some very briefly no time to get an address just use this app to save gps location in Evernote or whatever.
reviews.author: Isaac Lopez

reviews.title: Better than google maps!
reviews.comment: I noticed on a trip to the dunes (middle of no where) google maps would not let me share my location. GM seems only to work at a physical address. This should work anywhere.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I love you!
reviews.comment: You represent proof that open source ultimately win over conglomerate corporations. Works way better than any Google location app
reviews.author: Jacob Waters

reviews.title: Fast and accurate
reviews.comment: In a nutshell - simple reliable fast and accurate. Non intrusive permissions. Quickest way to share your location.
reviews.author: Janaka Vithanage

reviews.title: Didn\'t like it
reviews.comment: I had to go outside my house to find myself. Downloaded \"I am here\". Like that one a lot
reviews.author: Lucas Corbin

reviews.title: Got me out of tricky situations
reviews.comment: Helps when your friends need to know the closest exfil points. I\'m in one now and no idea where I am. Some lat longs should and they picked me up pronto. Get it. Get it now
reviews.author: Jay Wick

reviews.title: Thanks Ken
reviews.comment: Ken to the rescue, just when Google map update finally broke an already troublesome Latitude app, I was relieved to find Kens app allowed our location sharing to happen, without a struggle. Excellent for a quick fix!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool app
reviews.comment: I do a lot of trail running- awesome for setting way points on the fly or getting a buddy to come get my tired behind in the middle of nowhere... :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Bloody great.. Whether I\'m letting people know where I am in remote situation (provided cell coverage)  or recording \'waypoints\'  to a notepad app,  can\'t fault it. Nice.
reviews.author: Maliyan Journey

reviews.comment: Great App. Delivers for sure! Thanks!
reviews.author: Bill Perez

reviews.title: Zomg best ever
reviews.comment: Works so well that I can literally say installing this was the single best decision anyone has ever made. Now I have a reason for living.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I LOVE THIS.
reviews.comment: Keep it simple.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Little to spartan maybe
reviews.comment: Scroll to self would\'ve been good. And a \"no data use\" mode could be of use too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice but...
reviews.comment: Would like the option to select location to send from the map when GPS isn\'t getting a fix.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: AWESOME! Especially if you have google maps and google nav on your phone. Send where you are to someone to come to you straight from the link.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: There\'s no one-tap widget. A MUST HAVE to be able to preset recipient for one-tap sending.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Fabulous!
reviews.author: Masrur Rahman
